examples: The criminal was aware of the illegality of his act.

definitions.definition: a defense to the validity of a contract because it was in violation of the law
examples: When sued for refusing to pay for services provided by a prostitute , the customer raised the defense of illegality .

main_definition: ( law ) the state of being illegal
secondary_definitions: ( law , uncountable ) a defense to the validity of a contract because it was in violation of the law
